name: Breakfast for Dinner Casserole
preparation: In a large Fry Pan or skillet, cook turkey with Guacamole Dip Mix for approximately 6–7 min.
While turkey is cooking, combine egg whites, milk, and 1⁄2 cup low-fat cheese in a large bowl. Set aside.
Add spinach to turkey and stir-fry for 1–2 min.
Add bread and egg mixture; cover with lid and cook for 4–5 min.
While mixture is cooking, combine salsa mix, lime juice, and chopped cilantro (if desired) in a small bowl. Set aside.
Top with salsa and avocado, if desired; serve on bed of greens alongside sliced oranges. Enjoy!
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced meal.

products.name: Guacamole Dip Mix
summary: An all-natural blend of sweet peppers, garlic, and chilies comes together to create the perfect guacamole––minus the sodium and additives!

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chillies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.
